Accessibility / Structure Headings / Fieldset Legend Checker

The Fieldset/Legend Checker bookmarklet validates that groups of related radio and checkbox inputs are properly wrapped in fieldset elements with descriptive legends. Finds all radio and checkbox inputs, groups them by name attribute, checks if each group is wrapped in a fieldset, and verifies the presence of a legend element with descriptive text. Displays a panel showing each group's status‚Äîpassing groups (fieldset + legend) in green, failing groups in red. Click any group to highlight its inputs on the page. Run again to remove.

WCAG SC 1.3.1: Info and RelationshipsWCAG SC 3.3.2: Labels or Instructions
Run Fieldset Legend Checker

Test run or drag to
bookmarklets bar to install
